tha-ap380:1.4_0: I remember it as a great flood.
tha-ap380:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap380:2.4_0: The palm fruits of this palm tree.
tha-ap380:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
tha-ap380:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap380:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sumanā.
tha-ap380:7.1_0: The eighth equivalent of thought is the senior,
